scripts.pm2:restart: if pm2 show untitiled ; then pm2 restart untitiled ; else echo 'No pm2 instance for untitiled' ; fi
scripts.pm2:stop: if pm2 show untitiled ; then pm2 stop untitiled ; else echo 'No pm2 instance for untitiled' ; fi
scripts.pm2:delete: if pm2 show untitiled ; then pm2 delete untitiled ; else echo 'No pm2 instance for untitiled' ; fi
scripts.pm2:reboot: npm ci && npm run build && npm run pm2:stop && npm run pm2:delete && npm run pm2:start
scripts.pm2:restart:sandbox: if pm2 show untitiled-sandbox ; then pm2 restart untitiled-sandbox ; else echo 'No pm2 instance for untitiled-sandbox' ; fi
scripts.pm2:stop:sandbox: if pm2 show untitiled-sandbox ; then pm2 stop untitiled-sandbox ; else echo 'No pm2 instance for untitiled-sandbox' ; fi
scripts.pm2:delete:sandbox: if pm2 show untitiled-sandbox ; then pm2 delete untitiled-sandbox ; else echo 'No pm2 instance for untitiled-sandbox' ; fi
scripts.pm2:reboot:sandbox: npm ci && npm run build && npm run pm2:stop:sandbox && npm run pm2:delete:sandbox && npm run pm2:start:sandbox
